name: Unique 3
description: '''Unique 3''' are an English [[rave music|rave]] band from [[Bradford]], Yorkshire. Formed in 1988, they pioneered the '[[bleep techno]]' sound. Their song "The Theme" captured this sound, and it later appeared in remixed form on [[the Chemical Brothers]]' compilation album, ''[[Brothers Gonna Work It Out]]''. Their most commercially successful record was "Musical Melody", which reached number 29 on the [[UK Singles Chart]] in April 1990 and led to a performance on ''[[Top of the Pops]]''.
